item.title: HTB - Admirer
item.description: nmap _ admirer nmap -p- --min-rate=3000 -T4 10.10.10.187 [...] PORT STATE SERVICE 21/tcp open ftp 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http _ admirer nmap -sC -sV -p21,22,80 10.10.10.187 [...] PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 21/tcp open ftp vsftpd 3.0.3 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.4p1 Debian 10+deb9u7 (protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 2048 4a:71:e9:21:63:69:9d:cb:dd:84:02:1a:23:97:e1:b9 (RSA) | 256 c5:95:b6:21:4d:46:a4:25:55:7a:87:3e:19:a8:e7:02 (ECDSA) |_ 256 d0:2d:dd:d0:5c:42:f8:7b:31:5a:be:57:c4:a9:a7:56 (ED25519) 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.4.25 ((Debian)) | http-robots.txt: 1 disallowed entry |_/admin-dir |_http-server-header: Apache/2.
